name: FinalGradeCalculator
0:
”Alexa, open final grade calculator”
”I currently have a 70”
”My final is worth 35 percent”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: final grade calculator
des: This skill asks the user 3 questions regarding the user's grade. Alexa will ask you for your current grade, desired grade, and the weight of your final test. Once Alexa has received all of the required information, it will plug those numbers into a simple formula and give the user the required grade needed to achieve the desired grade.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
